title: Leadoff.ai
content:
1. Introduction

Leadoff.ai is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and sharing of your personal information. Our commitment extends to compliance with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

2. Information Collection

Personal Information Collected

  • Identifiers: Such as name, email address, IP address, and account information.

  • Financial Information: Payment details if purchasing services.

  • Usage Data: Information on how services are used, including interaction data.

Methods of Collection

  • Through direct interactions when you register, purchase, or request services.

  • Automatically via cookies and analytics when you visit our website.

3. Use of Information

We use the collected data to:

  • Provide and improve our services.

  • Communicate with you regarding your account or services.

  • Comply with legal obligations and protect our legal rights.

  • Conduct marketing and analytics.

4. Data Sharing and Disclosure

Third Parties

  • Service Providers: To support our service delivery (e.g., payment processors, cloud hosting).

  • Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights.

Disclosure Practices

  • We do not sell personal data as defined under CCPA.

  • Users will be notified if their data is subject to any business transactions or legal disclosures.

5. Data Security

We implement robust security measures such as encryption, secure server environments, and access controls to protect your data. In the event of a data breach, affected individuals will be notified in accordance with legal requirements.

6. User Rights

CCPA and GDPR Rights

  • Access and Portability: Request access to and copies of personal data.

  • Correction: Update or correct inaccuracies.

  • Deletion: Request deletion of personal data.

  • Objection and Restriction: Object to processing and request restriction of processing.

  • Consent Withdrawal: Withdraw consent where applicable.

To exercise these rights, contact us via it@leadoff.ai. 

7. International Data Transfers

Data may be transferred and stored outside your jurisdiction. We ensure all transfers are protected by legal safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decisions.

8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies to enhance site functionality and user experience. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

9. Children’s Privacy

Our services are not directed at children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children without parental consent.

10. Updates to the Privacy Policy

This policy may be updated to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Users will be notified of significant changes through our website or by direct communication.

11. Contact Information

For any privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact us at:

Email: support@leadoff.ai 

Address: 7943 Ramsgate Avenue, Los Angeles CA 90045
